snippet: The main character in the Canadian television series “Endgame” is a former world champion from Russia who solves crimes from his luxury hotel suite.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column examines a chess game featured in the Canadian television series Endgame, which is about a former world champion chess player.
lead_paragraph: The main character in the Canadian television series “Endgame” is a former world champion from Russia who solves crimes from his luxury hotel suite.

headline.print_headline: On TV, Bored Ex-Champion Turns to Fighting Crime
headline.main: On TV, Bored Ex-Champion Turns to Fighting Crime
